directions.info: Pre measure all ingredients, place them in little bowls.
Sift flour, ginger, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt into a large bowl.
Gather meez and prepare to make batter.
Beat butter an sugar with your stand mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy.
Add molasses, egg, and vanilla. Mix well.
Gradually beat in flour mixture on low speed until well mixed.
Press the dough into a thick flat disk.
Wrap in plastic wrap for 4 hours or overnight.
Roll out dough on a lightly floured surface a fourth of an inch thick.
Cut into desired shapes. Place 1inÂ  apart on parchment covered baking sheet.
Bake 8-10 minutes or until edges of cookies brown.
